code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white female air traffic controller aged 23 years says she is having symptoms of severe diarrhea 2-4 x day, mostly during the day. ocas ETOH on w/e she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 176 cm, Weight 58.6 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17, CBC Hgb=7 g/dL,Hct=25 %, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:administered misoprostol - 400 mg daily, performed CBC, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe diarrhea, severe abdominal pain. she has history of severe epigastric pain. patient is a 23 year old white female air traffic controller. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 57.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, CBC Hgb=7 g/dL,Hct=25 %, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:administered misoprostol - 400 mg daily, performed CBC, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
